name: Rust And Cordy
description:
You're stuck in a castle.

In a cell.

With nothing but a robot inmate.

Maybe... If you work together...

You could escape!

Controls:

A & D - Move Left and Right

Spacebar - Jump

R - Retry

S - Talk

Left Click - Pickup/Follow

Right Click - Open Door

Game made for WOWIE! Jam 4.0
